title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2103.6 - Insurance premium
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2103.6 - Insurance premium

State Regulations

Borrowers receiving LLR loans shall be charged the same
insurance premium as is charged on any other loan guarantee by the corporation
for each such loan in accordance with the procedures of the
corporation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
2103.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
